verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> to <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H389>Truly<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1747>waits<s%> on <S%H430>God:<s%> from him comes my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
He <S%H389>only<s%> is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation;<s%> he is my <S%H4869>defense;<s%> I shall not be <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H4131>moved.<s%>

<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H2050>imagine<s%> <S%H205>mischief<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> a <S%H376>man?<s%> you shall be <S%H7523>slain<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you: as a <S%H5186>bowing<s%> <S%H7023>wall<s%> shall you be, and as a <S%H1760>tottering<s%> <S%H1447>fence.<s%>

They <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H3289>consult<s%> to <S%H5080>cast<s%> him down from his <S%H7613>excellency:<s%> they <S%H7521>delight<s%> in <S%H3576>lies:<s%> they <S%H1288>bless<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> but they <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H7130>inwardly.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H1826>wait<s%> you <S%H389>only<s%> on <S%H430>God;<s%> for my <S%H8615>expectation<s%> is from him.
He <S%H389>only<s%> is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> he is my <S%H4869>defense;<s%> I shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
In <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> and my <S%H3519>glory:<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> is in <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H982>Trust<s%> in him at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times;<s%> you <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8210>pour<s%> out your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for us. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%> <S%H120><s%> of low degree are <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and <S%H1121>men<s%> <S%H376><s%> of <S%H376>high<s%> degree are a <S%H3576>lie:<s%> to be <S%H5927>laid<s%> in the <S%H3976>balance,<s%> they are <S%H3162>altogether<s%> <S%H7043>lighter<s%> than <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

<S%H982>Trust<s%> not in <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> and <S%H1891>become<s%> not <S%H1891>vain<s%> in <S%H1498>robbery:<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H2428>riches<s%> <S%H5107>increase,<s%> <S%H7896>set<s%> not your <S%H3820>heart<s%> on them.
<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H259>once;<s%> <S%H8147>twice<s%> have I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2098>this;<s%> that <S%H5797>power<s%> belongs to <S%H430>God.<s%>
Also to you, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> belongs <S%H2617>mercy:<s%> for you <S%H7999>render<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H4639>work.<s%>
